EDIT: Alignment wasn't working at the time of this post, but it is working now. Further testing might be needed. Setting the inline docking port as the root part might be a temp workaround.

Trying to line up a mk2 clamp-o-tron is kind of difficult since "control from here" will rotate the camera, but the target direction on the nav ball is determined using the root part and not the docking port. (Kind of occurred to me that this picture proves nothing, this was an issue in 0.90)

Edited June 9, 2015 by zeekkay
The issue "seemed" to pop up at the time of the post. No so sure if it is an issue anymore...
